content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a wooden chest at position (43.5, -82.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a wooden chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) 

### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no research in progress

### Inserter system at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)), wooden chest (position (2.5, 0.5)) and small electric pole (position (2.5, 1.5))

### Inserter system at position (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) and wooden chest (position (0.5, 2.5))

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure that the steam engine has the required input liquid before starting the engine
### Errors when using entities but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure that the entity has the required fluid present in connections before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no water
-  Ensure that the offshore pump has access to water before using it
